Constructor Detail

Bishop

public Bishop(int x,
              int y,
              boolean color)
The Bishop(int x,int y, boolean color) constructor calls the Piece constructor with parameters x,y, which is the location of the piece. It also adds an image of a bishop to the bishop object. Finally the color parameter is used to set the color of the piece, where true is black and false is white.

Parameters:
x -
y -
color -

The getType() method returns the type of the piece, in this case "Bishop"
